.. _`extract_collections`:

EXTRACT_COLLECTIONS
===================

Extract collection paths from imeta queries





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_irods_extract_collections:
        input:
            "imeta.txt"
        output:
            "collections.txt"
        threads: 3
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/iRODS/extract_collections"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris
